div.b: Tip: Navigate menus like a pro

p.style: color:#888888;font-size: 15px; line-height: 25px; margin-top: 0; text-align: justify; text-justify: inter-word;

div.p: From the Home page, start typing what you'd like to access. Odoo will suggest menus matching your search. Use arrow keys and press enter to jump to your menu.
